title: The Lair of Mutants
author: Jim Jacobson
intro:
You have heard tales of horrible mutant creatures living in an abandoned
laboratory beneath the city. The entrance has been sealed for years, but
recently strange sounds have been heard coming from below.

The Guild Master has hired you to investigate and eliminate the threat.
You descend the rusty ladder into the darkness...

rooms.name: Abandoned Entrance
rooms.description:
You're in a dusty entrance hall. Broken furniture and debris litter
the floor. Strange chemical smells waft through the air. A rusty door
leads north, and you can still climb up the ladder to the south to escape.

rooms.name: Main Corridor
rooms.description:
A long corridor stretches before you. Flickering lights overhead
cast eerie shadows. Doors line both sides - east and west. The corridor
continues north.

rooms.name: Central Laboratory
rooms.description:
This appears to be the main laboratory. Broken glass and overturned
equipment are everywhere. Strange stains cover the floor. Passages lead
east and west.

rooms.name: Supply Closet
rooms.description:
A small storage room filled with shelves. Most supplies have long since
rotted or been looted, but you might find something useful here.

rooms.name: Observation Room
rooms.description:
This room has a large window looking into the lab. The glass is cracked
but intact. Control panels line one wall, all dark and dead.

rooms.name: Specimen Chamber
rooms.description:
Large tanks line the walls, most broken and empty. Something moves in
the shadows. This room gives you a very bad feeling.

rooms.name: Chemical Storage
rooms.description:
Shelves of chemicals, many leaking or broken. The fumes make your eyes
water. You shouldn't stay here long.

rooms.name: Director's Office
rooms.description:
A lavish office, now in ruins. A large desk sits in the center, covered
in dust and papers. Behind it is a heavy safe.

rooms.name: Surface
rooms.description:
You climb back up to the surface, breathing in the fresh air. Your
mission is complete - for better or worse.

items.name: steel pipe
items.description: A heavy steel pipe, makes a decent improvised weapon.

items.name: lab coat
items.description: A thick lab coat that might provide some protection.

items.name: antidote
items.description: A vial labeled 'Universal Antidote' - might come in handy.

items.name: silver key
items.description: A small silver key, looks important.

items.name: experimental serum
items.description: A glowing green liquid in a sealed container. Value unknown.

items.name: safe
items.description: A heavy steel safe. It's locked.

items.name: gold bars
items.description: Three small gold bars - payment for the dark experiments.

items.name: machete
items.description: A sharp machete, perfect for close combat.

monsters.name: mutant rat
monsters.description: A rat the size of a dog, with patchy fur and glowing eyes.

monsters.name: failed experiment
monsters.description: A shambling humanoid creature, barely recognizable as human.

monsters.name: security robot
monsters.description: An old security robot, still functional and aggressive.

monsters.name: mutant horror
monsters.description:
A massive creature of twisted flesh and bone. The pinnacle of the
experiments, and clearly hostile.

monsters.name: lab assistant ghost
monsters.description: The ethereal form of a former lab assistant, trapped here.
